Giliran Tina Toon Sindir Willliam PSI Soal Anggaran Janggal APBD
01 Nov 2019, 00:31 by Imam Hamdi, Dwi Arjanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta -Anggota Fraksi PDI Perjuangan DPRD DKI Jakarta, Agustina Hermanto atau dikenal Tina Toon, menyindir William Aditya Sarana dari Partai Solidaritas Indonesia alias PSI Jakarta dalam rapat Komisi A bersama satuan kerja perangkat daerah di DPRD DKI, Kamis, 31 Oktober 2019.
William adalah anggota Fraksi PSI DPRD DKI, yang menyorot kejanggalan anggaran pembelian lem aibon senilai Rp 82 miliar di Kebijakan Umum Anggaran dan Prioritas Plafon Anggaran Sementara (KUA PPAS) 2020.
"Ini belum dibahas (legiator), di luar sudah opininya kemana-mana," kata Tina dalam rapat Komisi A di DPRD DKI.
Menurut Tina, segala informasi bisa berkembang secara liar ke publik terkait penganggaran APBD DKI. Padahal, ada mekanisme pembahasan anggaran yang belum dilakukan. "Nah itu hati-hati buat teman-teman semua. Karena ini adalah marwahnya kita semua dari SKPD dan DPRD."
Selain itu, Tina mengingatkan agar pemerintah lebih berhati-hati dalam memasukan anggaran. Sebab, di era keterbukaan ini semua masyarakat bakal ikut mengawasi.
Pemerintah pun, kata Tina Toon, mesti bisa menjelaskan jika ada kesalahan dalam input data. Selain itu, Badan Perencanaan dan Pembangunan Daerah harus bertanggung jawab untuk menjelaskan penyebab kesalahan input data.
"Dan juga tolong dijelaskan. Di publik juga misal nih tahapannya KUA-PPAS bukan didetailnya. kalau didetailnya belum dibahas," demikian Tina Toon..

Turn Tina Toon Sindir Willliam PSI Budget Issuance Odd Budget
01 Nov 2019, 00:31 by Imam Hamdi, Dwi Arjanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PDI Struggle member of DKI Jakarta DPRD, Agustina Hermanto or known as Tina Toon, insinuated William Aditya Sarana from the Indonesian Solidarity Party aka PSI Jakarta in a Commission A meeting with regional work units in the DKI DPRD, Thursday, 31 October 2019 .
William is a member of the Jakarta DPRD PSI Faction, highlighting the irregularities in the budget for the purchase of aibon glue worth Rp 82 billion in the General Budget Policy and Priority Budget Ceiling (KUA PPAS) 2020.
"This has not been discussed (legiator), outside of his opinion everywhere," Tina said in a Commission A meeting at the Jakarta DPRD.
According to Tina, all information can develop wildly to the public related to DKI's APBD budgeting. In fact, there is a budget discussion mechanism that has not yet been conducted. "Now, be careful for all of your friends. Because this is the spirit of all of us from the SKPD and DPRD."
In addition, Tina reminded the government to be more careful in entering the budget. Because, in this era of openness, all people will come to supervise.
The government, said Tina Toon, must be able to explain if there are errors in data input. In addition, the Regional Planning and Development Agency must be responsible for explaining the causes of data input errors.
"And also please explain. In the public, for example, the stages of KUA-PPAS are not detailed. If the details have not been discussed," said Tina Toon ..
